scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.translate: npm run translate:pot && npm run translate:js
scripts.acorn:make:composer: echo 'What do you want to name your composer?' && read x && wp acorn make:composer ${x} && echo 'https://docs.roots.io/sage/10.x/composers/'
scripts.acorn:make:component: echo 'What do you want to name your component?' && read x && wp acorn make:component ${x} && echo 'https://docs.roots.io/sage/10.x/components/'
scripts.acfComposer:CreateFieldGroup: echo 'What do you want to name your field group' && read x && wp acorn acf:field ${x} && echo 'https://github.com/Log1x/acf-composer' && echo 'https://github.com/Log1x/acf-builder-cheatsheet'
scripts.acfComposer:CreateFieldPartial: echo 'What do you want to name your field partial' && read x && wp acorn acf:partial ${x} && echo 'https://github.com/Log1x/acf-builder-cheatsheet'
scripts.acfComposer:CreateOptionsMenu: echo 'What do you want to name your Options Name' && read x && wp acorn acf:options ${x} && echo 'https://github.com/Log1x/acf-builder-cheatsheet'
scripts.acfComposer:CreateOptionsMenu:full: echo 'What do you want to name your Options Name' && read x && wp acorn acf:options ${x} --full && echo 'https://github.com/Log1x/acf-builder-cheatsheet'
